oshiSkill.name: ("Blue Mic")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] If your Center holomem is Blue, their Arts gain +20 power until the end of this turn.

spOshiSkill.name: ("Back Shot!")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Can be used when one of your holomems deals damage to one of your opponent's Back holomems: deal 50 special damage to that Back holomem.

name: Nekomata Okayu
extraEffect: You may put any number of copies of this holomem in your Deck.

name: Nekomata Okayu
collabEffect: If your Center holomem has #Gamers, deal 10 special damage to your opponent's Center holomem and one of their Back holomems. holomems Downed with this effect do not reduce LIFE.

name: Nekomata Okayu
collabEffect: You may reveal one card from the top of your deck. If that card is a Debut or Spot holomem, send the top card of your Cheer Deck to this holomem. Then put that card on the bottom of your deck.

skills.description: You may Archive 1 Blue Cheer from this holomem for the following effect: deal 10 special damage to your opponent's Center holomem and one of their Back holomems.

name: Nekomata Okayu
bloomEffect: Send a Cheer from your Archive to one of your holomems with #Gamers.

name: Nekomata Okayu
giftEffect: (Center position only) Your Takane Lui, Ookami Mio, Shirakami Fubuki, La+ Darknesss, and Inugami Korone's Arts gain +20 power.
extraEffect: When this holomem is Downed, lose 2 LIFE.

skills.description: You may Archive 2 Blue Cheers from this holomem for the following effect: deal 30 special damage to your opponent's Center holomem and one of their Back holomems.

name: Inugami Korone
collabEffect: If your Center holomem is Nekomata Okayu, reveal 1 Fan or Mascot from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

skills.description: If you have 2 or less cards in your hand, draw from your Deck until you have 3 cards in your hand.

name: Dorobo Construction
ability: This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card. Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems named <Nekomata Okayu>, <Takane Lui>, <Ookami Mio>, <Shirakami Fubuki>, <La+ Darknesss?, or <Inugami Korone? and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Okanyan
ability: Whenever the holomem with this Mascot attached takes damage while in the Center or Collab position, it takes -10 damage.If this Mascot is attached to Nekomata Okayu, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached Archives Cheer as part of their Ability or Arts, you may Archive this Mascot instead of one Blue Cheer.You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Onigirya
ability: The holomem with this Fan attached has +10 HP. This Fan may only be attached to your <Nekomata Okayu>, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.
